name: Medicham

attacks.name: Focus Punch
attacks.effect: Draw a card for each energy attached to Medicham. If Medicham takes no damage next turn, deal 40 damage to the Defending Pokemon.

attacks.name: High Jump Kick
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. If both are tails, deal 30 damage to Medicham.

flavor: Their focus, when uninterrupted, is incredibly dangerous. They're known to strike suddenly after long silences.
